javax.swing.text

Class GapContent.UndoPosRef

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.text.GapContent.UndoPosRef
  • Enclosing class:
    GapContent

    final class GapContent.UndoPosRef
extends Object
    Used to hold a reference to a Mark that is being reset as the result of removing from the content.
